message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's a good offer for you in the first round.
Let's be fair, Alice. I'll take a slight hit with $55, you get $45.  This deal won't be as good for me next round.
Bob, my turn!  I'll take $55, leaving you with $45.  It's better than what you'll get in the next round if you decline.
